name: Meat
description:
Meat is a text-only multiple-choice game where you try to make your way home after an evening of heavy drinking. It was made for Global Game Jam 2017, and thus is short and sweet and is good for a few laughs.

The interface is all text and audio, and has text-to-speech support, so should be able to be fully enjoyed by users with impaired sight.  A screen reader is not necessary, as the TTS all happens within the game itself.

v1 is the game jam version. v2 has sound effects and text-to-speech support, but the gameplay is essentially the same.
